籤詩版本二:
Nws nyuaj heev rau kev ua tiav, tab sis hnub sib ntaus sib tua rau kev sib yuav yog tibneeg hu tauj coob ib ntus.
Thaum kawg, nws yuav raug ib tug xub ntaus, tus uas muaj koob muaj npe coj cov neeg muaj koob meej.
詩意:
Qhov no hexagram sawv cev rau koob hmoov hauv kev zais.
Txhua yam yog hmoov zoo.
解曰: Kev xav hloov. Enron thaum kawg. Yog koj nug txog kev siv. Tsuas yog nyob ze rau cov neeg muaj koob muaj npe.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Phau ntawv pom zoo Jiang Wei (Phau ntawv pom zoo Jiang Wei)
Jiang Wei (202-264), lub npe hu ua Boyue, yog neeg nyob hauv Ji County, Tianshui County, Liangzhou (tam sim no Gangu County, Tianshui City, Gansu Province).
Lub sijhawm Peb Lub Nceeg Vaj, Kong Ming tau coj nws cov tub rog los ntawm Qishan Roob 6 zaug los tua Cao Wei. Kong Ming mob hnyav thiab mob hnyav. Nws tau qhia nees nkaum plaub tshooj ntawm Phau Ntawv Tsov Rog rau General Jiang Wei, vam tias nws tuaj yeem tau txais nws cov keeb kwm qub txeeg qub teg.
(Qhov piv txwv ntawm zaj dab neeg no yog tias Jiang Wei tau txais qub txeeg qub teg rau qee qhov laj thawj)
聖意: Lub tsev muaj kev zoo siab, kuv mus zoo, Kuv nrhiav kev nplua nuj, kuv yuav poj niam, tus txiv neej taug kev tsis nyob ntawm no, tus kab laum nyob hauv Zhongping, rau tsiaj nyob hauv Zhongping, Kuv tab tom nrhiav ib tug neeg, kev foob yog ncaj ncees. , Kuv tsiv teb tsaws chaw, kuv vam meej, kuv vam meej, kuv raug kev txom nyem los ntawm cov kab mob Oriental, Kuv muaj hmoo nyob hauv Xingxing toj ntxas.
古人: Phau Ntawv Pom Zoo rau Jiang Wei (Phau Ntawv rau Jiang Wei)
第X籤: Kos npe rau ntawm kaum ib
